Literature.Title: Structure-Activity Relationship and Mode of Action of a Frog Secreted Antibacterial Peptide B1CTcu5 Using Synthetically and Modularly Modified or Deleted (SMMD) Peptides.
Literature.Author: Abraham P, Sundaram A, R A, V R, George S, Kumar K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus coagulans ATCC 7050(MIC=25µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis MTCC 14416(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 9542(MIC=50µg/ml),Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>100µg/ml),Vibrio cholerae(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=50µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=100µg/ml)
